successes.title: Minaal Carry-on: travel faster, happier & more productive
successes.description: The perfect travel bag is easy to pack, carry & use – and helps you stay professional. It's a backpack – that packs like a suitcase.

Pledges.description:
***STREET HIGH-FIVE + THANK YOU*** ||
You'll be eternally cool, and if anyone says otherwise we won't believe them. If we see you in the street we promise to high-five you (no house calls). We'll also put your name in the suitably-named Epic Thank You Post on our site (optional).

***PLUS TRAVEL E-BOOK*** ||
You'll receive the e-book 'Personal Guides To Efficient Travel: 25 ProTravellers Share Their Secrets'. We've handpicked 25 experienced, savvy, and notable travellers to share their tips, packing lists, stories from the road - and more! INCLUDES everything from $1 level.

***PLUS PROTRAVEL SOCKS*** ||
1 pair of your choice of Minaal ProTravel Socks w/FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING. INCLUDES everything from all previous levels.

***PLUS LIMITED EARLY BIRD BAG SPECIAL REWARD*** (TOTAL VALUE APPROX $325) || One original, hot-off-the-press Minaal ProTravel Bag w/ FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING. Get in early and claim the best deal. That's an order, not a threat. OK, it's also a threat. Don't mess with us. INCLUDES everything from all previous levels.

***EARLY-ISH BIRD SPECIAL BAG REWARD*** (TOTAL VALUE APPROX $325) || Whoa. We're feeling the love, so here's another special batch for you early-ish birds - last chance! You get one dynamic Minaal ProTravel Bag w/ FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING. INCLUDES Everything from all previous levels (except $199 bag special).

***PLUS PRE-SALE BAG SPECIAL REWARD*** (TOTAL VALUE APPROX $325) || One sleek Minaal ProTravel Bag w/ FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING. Yeah, you missed out on the Early Bird, but we decided to give you a sweet deal anyway... INCLUDES Everything from all previous levels (except $199 bag special).

***PLUS CUSTOM LEATHER TRAVEL WALLET + ONLINE COURSE + EXTRA PAIR SOCKS + BRONZE MEMBERSHIP*** || A custom-embossed Italian-leather travel wallet, access to the digital version of our Product Design Workshop course, TWO pairs of socks, Bronze-level Minaal Beta List membership... INCLUDES one suave Minaal ProTravel Bag w/FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING, everything from $1 and $10 levels, and you get one *extra* pair of socks from the $25 level.

***PLUS WORKSHOP MENTORING PACKAGE + WEBSITE PROFILE + SILVER MEMBERSHIP*** || Complimentary entry to the Minaal Product Design Workshop (including 2 days accommodation and food expenses), you'll be profiled on the Minaal website (not compulsory), and you'll receive Silver-level Minaal Beta List membership... INCLUDES
one debonaire Minaal ProTravel Bag w/FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING, and everything else from $1, $10, and $500 levels. PRODUCTS DELIVERED FREE INTERNATIONALLY IN APPROX. APRIL – WORKSHOP DETAILS TBC.

***PLUS TRIP TO ASIA + FACTORY TOUR + BUSINESS GETAWAY*** ||
After receiving all the Minaal rewards, one or both of the Minaal founders will accompany you on an all-expenses-paid trip to Asia to experience the process of making your own products. After attending the Product Design Workshop, you'll tour at least one factory, soak in the life of entrepreneurship in Saigon, and spend a few nights with us on a beachside business strategy retreat in Vung Tau. The trip may be photographed and filmed and if so, the end files will be provided to you. Travel details will be discussed after successful funding of the project. Subject to physical readiness, visa eligibility, and other annoying things. PRODUCTS DELIVERED FREE INTERNATIONALLY IN APPROX. APRIL – TRIP DETAILS TBC.
